name: StreamRunner
description:
StreamRunner is a side scrolling game in which users who are following the person's live on twitch can interfere with the game in different ways.

The commands available to interfere in the game will be the following

  • ! p <0-9>
  • ! v <1-9>
  • ! m

During the course of a game, coins can be collected that will be used to buy different powers that can be used in the game.

The powers available will be the following:

  • More coins
  • Attract coins
  • Triple jump
  • Rescue platform
  • Protective shield
  • Fly

You need to enter in https://twitchapps.com/tmi/ to get the token for connect your twitch account with the game. The auth token can be place in configuration screen.
